rooms.description: Spacious living area with Chettinad-style decor and large windows for ample natural light.
Open dining space adjoining the kitchen, designed for family gatherings.
Fully equipped kitchen area with modern amenities and traditional elements.
Modern bathroom featuring both vanity and shower space.
Connecting corridor linking main living areas with the private gym.

openings.description: Entryway designed following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Private gym access from the main living area.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony and Vastu-aligned layout.
Guest room ensuring privacy and comfort.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures.
Designated study area for work and relaxation.

openings.description: Balcony entrance ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Staircase connecting ground and first floor.

rooms.description: Private gym equipped with modern fitness equipment and soundproofing.
